events.message: I am submitting a claim for the recent car accident that occurred on April 29th involving my vehicle and a stationary object.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident due to the nature of the collision involving the insured car.
An agent has been assigned to your case to assist with the vehicle accident claim and ensure timely processing.
We have received your accident claim and acknowledge the report of the collision affecting your car.
Please submit the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and insurance documents to proceed with your claim.
All requested documents, including the accident report and vehicle repair estimates, have been submitted successfully.
Our investigation into the cause and circumstances of the vehicular accident has officially commenced.
The inspection and review of the accident details have been completed, confirming liability and damage extent.
A settlement offer has been proposed based on the assessment of damage and repair costs for your vehicle.
Thank you for the feedback regarding the settlement offer; weâ€™re glad the process has been satisfactory so far.
Your auto accident claim has been approved, and the payout will be processed promptly for the damages.
The payment for the approved settlement amount has been issued to your designated account today.
Your claim related to the vehicle accident has been officially closed. Thank you for your cooperation.
The auto accident claim file has been archived following closure, kept securely for any future reference.
